sections.title: Summary
sections.content: Accomplished litigation attorney with 10+ years of experience representing clients in civil and commercial disputes. Recognized for persuasive advocacy, strategic case management, and a strong record of favorable verdicts.

Developed and implemented firm-wide litigation strategies, resulting in a 15% reduction in case duration.
